text:
Don't recommend, bed is hard, aircon only in the rooms,  2nd floor, sliding door faulty, overall poor maintenance

It's really not worth the money spent
Spacious... If only the living room & the dinning room are aircon.. Will be perfect...
Interior is nice. Outside is a little smelly due to the stray dogs roaming the area. Also a very deserted location. Not good if you don't have a car. Would not recommend
Great restaurant with great sea view. Family friendly and a really good chef. We had a great meal, really enjoyed three egg spinach and crispy beancurd!
Nice and quiet chalet... great for family or big crowd of friends to celebrate birthday party! But only allowed one single vehicle to park
